scripts.clean: find packages -name '.vite' -type d -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true && find packages -name 'dist' -type d -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.test:all: cd packages/core && bun test:all && cd ../viewer && bun test:e2e
scripts.test:coverage: cd packages/parser && bun run test:coverage && cd ../markdown-renderer && bun run test:coverage && cd ../dom-renderer && bun run test:coverage && cd ../core && bun run test:coverage
scripts.test:unit: cd packages/parser && bun test --coverage && cd ../markdown-renderer && bun test --coverage && cd ../dom-renderer && bun test --coverage && cd ../core && bun test --coverage test/*.test.ts
scripts.typecheck: cd packages/parser && bun run typecheck && cd ../markdown-renderer && bun run typecheck && cd ../dom-renderer && bun run typecheck && cd ../core && bun run typecheck
scripts.test:e2e:headless: cd packages/viewer && bun run build && npx playwright test --config=playwright.precommit.config.ts
scripts.precommit: node scripts/check-file-sizes.cjs && node scripts/quiet-lint.js && node scripts/quiet-typecheck.js && node scripts/quiet-test-unit.js

simple-git-hooks.pre-push: node scripts/quiet-lint.js && node scripts/quiet-typecheck.js && node scripts/quiet-test-unit.js
